thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Steve the Wookiee
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Steve the Wookiee

author: Steve the Wookiee
title: Steve the Wookiee
text:
First time using this company and was having problems with my order being declined at the payment section. I was trying to purchase some US Nintendo eshop codes from the UK.
I emailed their customer service, and received a response almost instantaneously, resolving my issue.
I'll definitely be using them again for digital codes.
Thanks!!
